Fall_River.James D. Hathaway House:
The James D. Hathaway House is a historic house located at 311 Pine Street in Fall River, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
It is a 2-1/2 story, wood-framed structure, three bays wide, with a front-gable roof and a flush-boarded facade sheltered by a monumental two-story, Greek Revival style portico with fluted Ionic columns. It was built in 1843 by James D. Hathaway, a carpenter, and was perhaps designed by Russell Warren or copied by Hathaway from his designs.
